form.title: Credit Card Information
form.message: Please enter in your credit card information to be used for your reservation.

errors.card_number: Enter a full credit card number.
errors.name: Enter the name printed on the credit card.
errors.exp_month: Enter the credit card expiry month.
errors.exp_year: Enter the credit card expiry year.
errors.cvv: Enter the PIN on the back of the credit card.

license_upload.title: Driver's License
license_upload.message: Upload front and back images of your driver's license.

go_back.title: Are you sure?
go_back.message: Going back will discard the added files.

front_image.title: Front Image
front_image.drag: Drag and drop the front image here
front_image.not_selected: You must select the front image.

back_image.title: Back Image
back_image.drag: Drag and drop the back image here
back_image.not_selected: You must select the back image.

rental_signature.agreement_message: Draw your signature below and submit it towards your rental contract.
rental_signature.reservation_message: Draw your signature below and submit it towards your booking.

error_boundary.title: Uh Oh
error_boundary.message: There was a fatal error in the application.

success_submission.title: Success!
success_submission.message: Thank you for submitting your information towards the

authentication_submission.title: Authenticating
authentication_submission.message: We had trouble authenticating this connection.

bad_submission.title: Uh Oh
bad_submission.message: I encountered an error when trying to submit your information.

query_missing.title: Uh Oh
query_missing.message: It looks like all not all the necessary information was sent.
